name: "Desperate Housewives" Season 1 Online Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: How did Carlos' mother, Mrs. Solis, die?
questions.correct: She fell down the stairs at the hospital
options: She was hit by a car and died instantly
She was hit by a car and then died a week later
She jumped off of her son's roof
questions.explanation:
She fell down the stairs at the hospital.

	Mrs. Solis had come to visit Carlos and Gabrielle.  Carlos wanted her to find out if Gabrielle was having an affair.  Right after she found out about the affair she was struck by Andrew Van De Kamp who was on his way home and was driving drunk.  After several months in a coma, she awoke and went to find someone to tell them about her daughter-in-law's infidelities.  She slipped on the wet hospital floor and fell down the stairs.  She told the nurse to tell her son about the affair but she was wearing headphones and didn't hear what Mrs. Solis had said.

questions.text: What secret did Andrew Van De Kamp reveal about himself when his parents came to visit him at the boys camp?
questions.correct: He thought that he might be gay
options: He thought that he was an alcoholic
He wanted to marry his girlfriend
He was going to be dropping out of school
questions.explanation:
He thought that he might be gay.

	Bree was very concerned about Andrew's behavior so she sent him to a boys boot camp to help him get his life back in order.  While at the camp, he revealed to his parents that he thought he was gay.

questions.text: Which room of Susan Mayer's house caught fire?
questions.explanation:
kitchen.

	Susan's mother, Sophie, had come for a visit with Susan and Julie.  She then revealed to Susan of her problems with Morty and ended up moving in with them for a short time.  Susan was at the Solis' home for Carlos' going away to prison party when her kitchen window exploded with fire. It is revealed later that Zack caused the fire, though Susan initially believed it to be her mother's fault.

questions.text: What is the name of Lynette's annoying neighbor who accused her boys of stealing things from her house?
questions.explanation:
Karen McCluskey.

	Mrs. McCluskey is an elderly woman who doesn't like children much at all.  Lynette found out that her boys did steal from Mrs. McCluskey and she made them go apologize to her.

questions.text: Zack was led to believe that he had killed his sister Dana.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Zack was told that he had a sister that had died when he was younger.  In reality, he was actually Dana, there never was a sister.   The Young family had gotten Dana from an old patient of Mary Alice's when she worked as a nurse in Utah.  She traded them the baby for some money for drugs.

questions.text: What item did Mrs. Huber find in the fire and realized that it did not belong to Edie?
questions.explanation:
Glass measuring cup.

	Susan was being nosy because she thought that Edie was having an affair with Mike Delfino.  She snuck into the house that had several candles lit around the living room.  One of the candles got bumped and the curtains caught fire.

questions.text: After Edie found out that Susan had set fire to her house, why didn't she end up going to the police?
questions.correct: She didn't want there to be a problem with the insurance
options: She decided not to do anything at all
She decided she didn't care because she wanted a new house
She said she would forgive her if Susan would stay away from Mike Delfino
questions.explanation:
She didn't want there to be a problem with the insurance.

	Edie told Susan that she was going to let it go because she didn't want there to be a hold up with her insurance check.  She also added the stipulation that she be invited to their neighborhood card games.  Even if she never showed up she wanted to know that she was invited.

questions.text: Tom Scavo quit his job during this season.
questions.explanation:
True.

	He found out that Lynette had talked to the wife of his boss and told her they liked having him around the house.  She led her to believe that it wasn't such a great idea if Tom got the promotion.  When Tom found out about this from his boss, he became enraged and quit his job.

questions.text: Which character is the mother of four kids?
questions.explanation:
Lynette.

	Lynette was a high powered business woman before she became a stay at home mom.  It became so much for her that she began to take and become addicted to her children's ADD medicine.

questions.text: Which of the women of Wisteria Lane lost her husband in the last episode of this season?
questions.explanation:
Bree.

	Rex died of a heart attack in the hospital.  His medication had been sabotaged by George who had become obsessed with Bree and wanted her all to himself.
